Description: 
This application implements a command to demonstrate how to implement the function of user-defined grip editing.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "Samples.sln" and switch to the configuration that matches with the ZWCAD versionï¼Œthen build the application.

To use MyPipe.zrx:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing.
2. Run APPLOAD command and load the MyPipe.zrx file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "CreatePipe" command to create a custom entity firstly. Then, slelect the entity and drag the grip point.
